price: 73. Jame jums bus gausu vaisių, kuriuos jūs valgysite (kaip norėsite).
arabic: لَكُمۡ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ كَثِيرَةٞ مِّنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: lakum fīhā fākihatun kathīratun min'hā takulūna
